Blog.post: My first question is...why would anyone not pick emeka okafor first? I think this pick will go down as sam bowie over micheal jordan...aka the worst pick ever. Taking a high schooler over a proven collegiate athlete just boggles my mind but oh well its not like i'm an nba GM or anything. Ok enough of that bs. Today should be a fun filled day. wake up at 1, post a blog, shower, pay bills and go to work until 11 woohoo i can hardly wait. Everyone else out there have fun today..I know i won't :)

I want to steal Powers thunder here so I also will attempt to write a Haiku? I want to write a Haiku, it seemed a good thing To do, guess not though Is this good or does it just suck? I think I already know the answer to this....
urlLink Me at halloween. I think i was elvis? urlLink
Wow I have online journal isn't it interesting??
urlLink Everyone hates him because they die or get hurt, how could you hate a face like this? Very easily just ask Shake. urlLink

Well seems it has been like 3 years since my last blog I thought i would just throw one out there for you all! I've been doing a lot of soul searching lately and it seems i have come to the conclusion that i am most like the character Meatwad off of the show Aqua Teens Hunger Force (#1 in the hood G). This soul searching of course involved only 2 online quizzes, man am I deep! Anyway enough of this nonsense, Here I sit alone on a Saturday night because i have decided that i really wouldn't care if i never went to a bar again in my life. Of course this might reduce my chance of interaction with the human race but hey would anyone really miss me that much :) Aight thought i would just throw this blogger out there for you all hope you all enjoy it immensly! To end this blog i would like to throw some Meatwad quotes out there for you all....BLING! "I require a popsicle every 15 min you obviously did not read my memo!" "Everybody hates me because they die or get hurt. " "Alright spaghetti! Now that's italian!" "This noodles black..... and its hooked up to the tv set."

So i worked at hudsons today for the first time in like a month. And suprisingly i actually had fun i forgot how much i actually like it there compared to timbercreek its bling blinging! Anyway i thought i would just throw that out there. Especially since my last post was like 6 days ago. Ok so this might not make a lot of sense seems i am a little wasted. But hey who can't beat the dollar drafts of labatts at upfront that was key. Ok but thats all i want to say and i want to give a shout out to all my homeys at the JABA the House. Ok bye.
